doc:
Jack Dodson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Dodson 0 John Smeaton "Jack" Dodson (May 16, 1931 – September 16, 1994) was an American television actor best remembered for the milquetoast character Howard Sprague on The Andy Griffith Show and its spin-off Mayberry R.F.D. From 1959 until his death in 1994, Dodson was married to television art director Mary Dodson. John_Smeaton_"_Jack_"_Dodson ( May_16_,_1931 – September_16_,_1994 ) was an_American_television_actor_best remembered for the_milquetoast_character_Howard_Sprague on The_Andy_Griffith_Show and its_spin-off_Mayberry_R.F.D. From 1959 until his_death in 1994 , Dodson was_married to television_art_director_Mary_Dodson .
